title: The End Comes (1R169)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Moria
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Assignment: Spot 5 [Moria] minions to make the Free Peoples player assign the Ring-bearer to a skirmish.
Lore:	”'They have taken the Bridge and the second hall; we have barred the gates -_but cannot hold them for long….'”
Rarity:	R
